column4: Hello. Could someone test my ftp server : ftp://83.157.181.153
: could you try again now please?
I can ping the ip - but I get no ftp prompt
I guess you haven't got your firewall/router setup properly
getting ftp through a firewall can be tricky - suggest you google 'ftp firewall'
ubuntu I use proftpd. Can you try again now?
nope & this is getting old fast - read up on firewalling ftp as I say
you can use 'shields up' or similiar to check if your ftp port is contactable, that's step #1
yes it pings - google 'shields up' so you can check yourself
